column5: Cant post on classifieds...perhaps cause of newbie status.    Lookin for Rapala Risto Raps in their larger sizes..#7 & 9. Gold,  silver or blue only. PM if you have any you're willing to part with.
I bought some of those when they first came out. I'll have a look in the repository.

Call Frank at Bronte Outdoor 905-896-4009. He's got the Risto Raps on the wall (on sale or cheap I believe). I keep telling him to post them on a few websites and they would be gone allowing for some new stuff. I'm sure they are good lures as all Rapalas generally are and I have caught Walleyes and Smallmouth them myself.
called Frank but he couldnt locate them ........ didnt seem to know what they were. Thanks in any event.
I just talked to Frank and he has over 20 of them for $6.99. All sizes and probably most colours. If you can get one the big 7 or 9 are great in the Parrot colour for walleyes deep.
Looks like I only have 2 left. I'm going to hang on to them, sorry. I may have to call Frank.
